description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Wiki Read brings wikipedia to the xbox.  Wiki Read is an offline wikipedia reader that provides a database of over 30000 wikipedia articles with full link and search capabilities.
description.short: Wiki Read brings wikipedia to the xbox.  Wiki Read is an offline wikipedia reader that provides a database of over 30000 wikipedia articles with full link and search capabilities.
